windowsSetupScript.value:
[concat('# Copilot Agent 365 - Windows Setup Script
# Generated from ARM deployment
# Run this script in PowerShell to configure your local environment

$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "========================================" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "Copilot Agent 365 - Local Setup" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "========================================" -ForegroundColor Cyan

# Configuration from deployment
$FUNCTION_APP_NAME = "', parameters('functionAppName'), '"
$RESOURCE_GROUP = "', resourceGroup().name, '"
$SUBSCRIPTION_ID = "', subscription().subscriptionId, '"
$OPENAI_ENDPOINT = "', reference(variables('openAIResourceId')).endpoint, '"
$OPENAI_KEY = "', listKeys(variables('openAIResourceId'), '2023-05-01').key1, '"
$OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT = "', parameters('openAIDeploymentName'), '"
$STORAGE_ACCOUNT = "', parameters('storageAccountName'), '"
$FILE_SHARE = "', variables('fileShareName'), '"
$ASSISTANT_NAME = "', parameters('assistantName'), '"
$CHARACTERISTIC_DESC = "', parameters('characteristicDescription'), '"
$FUNCTION_URL = "https://', reference(variables('functionAppId')).defaultHostName, '/api/businessinsightbot_function"
$REPO_URL = "https://github.com/kody-w/EntraCopilotAgent365.git"

# Function to find Python 3.11
function Find-Python311 {
    $commands = @("python3.11", "python311")
    foreach ($cmd in $commands) {
        $fullPath = Get-Command $cmd -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
        if ($fullPath) {
            $ver = & $fullPath.Source --version 2>&1
            if ($ver -match "Python 3\.11") { return $fullPath.Source }
        }
    }
    # Check py launcher
    try {
        $ver = & py -3.11 --version 2>&1
        if ($ver -match "Python 3\.11") { return "py -3.11" }
    } catch {}
    # Check common paths
    $paths = @("$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Programs\Python\Python311\python.exe", "C:\Python311\python.exe")
    foreach ($p in $paths) {
        if (Test-Path $p) {
            $ver = & $p --version 2>&1
            if ($ver -match "Python 3\.11") { return $p }
        }
    }
    return $null
}

# Check prerequisites
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Checking prerequisites..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

# Check Git - auto install if missing
if (-not (Get-Command git -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) {
    Write-Host "[!] Git not found - installing..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    winget install Git.Git --accept-source-agreements --accept-package-agreements
    $env:Path = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","Machine") + ";" + [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","User")
}
Write-Host "[OK] Git installed" -ForegroundColor Green

# Check Python 3.11 - auto install if missing
$PYTHON_CMD = Find-Python311
if (-not $PYTHON_CMD) {
    Write-Host "[!] Python 3.11 not found - installing..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    winget install Python.Python.3.11 --accept-source-agreements --accept-package-agreements
    $env:Path = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","Machine") + ";" + [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","User")
    Start-Sleep -Seconds 2
    $PYTHON_CMD = Find-Python311
    if (-not $PYTHON_CMD) {
        Write-Host "[X] Failed to install Python 3.11. Please restart terminal and try again." -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
}
Write-Host "[OK] Python 3.11 found: $PYTHON_CMD" -ForegroundColor Green

# Check Azure Functions Core Tools - auto install if missing
if (-not (Get-Command func -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) {
    Write-Host "[!] Azure Functions Core Tools not found - installing..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    winget install Microsoft.Azure.FunctionsCoreTools --accept-source-agreements --accept-package-agreements
    $env:Path = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","Machine") + ";" + [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","User")
}
Write-Host "[OK] Azure Functions Core Tools installed" -ForegroundColor Green

# Check Azure CLI - auto install if missing
if (-not (Get-Command az -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) {
    Write-Host "[!] Azure CLI not found - installing..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    winget install Microsoft.AzureCLI --accept-source-agreements --accept-package-agreements
    $env:Path = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","Machine") + ";" + [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","User")
}
Write-Host "[OK] Azure CLI installed" -ForegroundColor Green

# Check Azure CLI login
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Checking Azure CLI login (required for local storage access)..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
$azAccount = az account show 2>$null | ConvertFrom-Json
if (-not $azAccount) {
    Write-Host "[X] Not logged into Azure CLI" -ForegroundColor Red
    Write-Host "Running: az login" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    az login
    $azAccount = az account show | ConvertFrom-Json
}
Write-Host "[OK] Logged in as: $($azAccount.user.name)" -ForegroundColor Green
$USER_OBJECT_ID = (az ad signed-in-user show --query id -o tsv)
Write-Host "[OK] User Object ID: $USER_OBJECT_ID" -ForegroundColor Green

# Assign Storage File Data Privileged Contributor role for local dev
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Assigning storage role for local development..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "Role: Storage File Data Privileged Contributor" -ForegroundColor White
try {
    az role assignment create --assignee $USER_OBJECT_ID --role "Storage File Data Privileged Contributor" --scope "/subscriptions/$SUBSCRIPTION_ID/resourceGroups/$RESOURCE_GROUP/providers/Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/$STORAGE_ACCOUNT" 2>$null
    Write-Host "[OK] Role assigned successfully" -ForegroundColor Green
} catch {
    Write-Host "[!] Role may already exist or requires manual assignment" -ForegroundColor Yellow
}

# Clone the repository
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Cloning repository..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
if (Test-Path "EntraCopilotAgent365") {
    Write-Host "Directory already exists, pulling latest..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    Set-Location EntraCopilotAgent365
    git pull
} else {
    git clone $REPO_URL
    Set-Location EntraCopilotAgent365
}

# Create virtual environment with Python 3.11
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Creating Python 3.11 virtual environment..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
if (Test-Path ".venv") { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .venv }
if ($PYTHON_CMD -eq "py -3.11") {
    & py -3.11 -m venv .venv
} else {
    & $PYTHON_CMD -m venv .venv
}

# Activate and install dependencies
Write-Host "Installing dependencies..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1
pip install --upgrade pip -q
pip install -r requirements.txt -q

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Creating local.settings.json (token-based auth)..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$localSettings = @{
    IsEncrypted = $false
    Values = @{
        FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME = "python"
        "AzureWebJobsStorage__accountName" = $STORAGE_ACCOUNT
        AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY = $OPENAI_KEY
        AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT = $OPENAI_ENDPOINT
        AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION = "2024-02-01"
        AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT_NAME = $OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT
        AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME = $STORAGE_ACCOUNT
        AZURE_FILES_SHARE_NAME = $FILE_SHARE
        ASSISTANT_NAME = $ASSISTANT_NAME
        CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTION = $CHARACTERISTIC_DESC
    }
}

$localSettings | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Set-Content -Path "local.settings.json" -Encoding UTF8
Write-Host "local.settings.json created successfully!" -ForegroundColor Green

# Deploy to Azure
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Deploying to Azure Function App..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
func azure functionapp publish $FUNCTION_APP_NAME

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "========================================" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host "Setup Complete!" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host "========================================" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Function App Name: $FUNCTION_APP_NAME" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "Function URL: $FUNCTION_URL" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "To run locally: .\\run.ps1" -ForegroundColor Yellow
')]

macLinuxSetupScript.value:
[concat('#!/bin/bash
# Copilot Agent 365 - Mac/Linux Setup Script
# Generated from ARM deployment
# Run: chmod +x setup.sh && ./setup.sh

set -e

RED="\033[0;31m"
GREEN="\033[0;32m"
YELLOW="\033[1;33m"
BLUE="\033[0;34m"
NC="\033[0m"

echo -e "${BLUE}========================================${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}Copilot Agent 365 - Local Setup${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}========================================${NC}"

# Configuration from deployment
FUNCTION_APP_NAME="', parameters('functionAppName'), '"
RESOURCE_GROUP="', resourceGroup().name, '"
SUBSCRIPTION_ID="', subscription().subscriptionId, '"
OPENAI_ENDPOINT="', reference(variables('openAIResourceId')).endpoint, '"
OPENAI_KEY="', listKeys(variables('openAIResourceId'), '2023-05-01').key1, '"
OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT="', parameters('openAIDeploymentName'), '"
STORAGE_ACCOUNT="', parameters('storageAccountName'), '"
FILE_SHARE="', variables('fileShareName'), '"
ASSISTANT_NAME="', parameters('assistantName'), '"
CHARACTERISTIC_DESC="', parameters('characteristicDescription'), '"
FUNCTION_URL="https://', reference(variables('functionAppId')).defaultHostName, '/api/businessinsightbot_function"
REPO_URL="https://github.com/kody-w/EntraCopilotAgent365.git"

# Detect OS
if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then
    OS_TYPE="macos"
else
    OS_TYPE="linux"
fi
echo -e "${YELLOW}Detected OS: $OS_TYPE${NC}"

# Function to find Python 3.11
find_python311() {
    for cmd in python3.11 python311; do
        if command -v $cmd &> /dev/null; then
            ver=$($cmd --version 2>&1)
            if [[ $ver == *"3.11"* ]]; then
                echo $cmd
                return 0
            fi
        fi
    done
    # Check Homebrew paths on macOS
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then
        for p in /opt/homebrew/bin/python3.11 /usr/local/bin/python3.11; do
            if [[ -x $p ]]; then
                echo $p
                return 0
            fi
        done
    fi
    return 1
}

# Function to install Python 3.11
install_python311() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing Python 3.11...${NC}"
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then
        if command -v brew &> /dev/null; then
            brew install python@3.11
            export PATH="/opt/homebrew/bin:/usr/local/bin:$PATH"
        else
            echo -e "${RED}Homebrew not found. Installing Homebrew first...${NC}"
            /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"
            export PATH="/opt/homebrew/bin:/usr/local/bin:$PATH"
            brew install python@3.11
        fi
    else
        sudo apt-get update
        sudo apt-get install -y python3.11 python3.11-venv python3.11-dev
    fi
}

echo ""
echo -e "${YELLOW}Checking prerequisites...${NC}"

# Check/Install Git
if ! command -v git &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[!] Git not found - installing...${NC}"
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then
        brew install git
    else
        sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y git
    fi
fi
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Git installed${NC}"

# Check/Install Python 3.11
PYTHON_CMD=$(find_python311)
if [[ -z "$PYTHON_CMD" ]]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[!] Python 3.11 not found - installing...${NC}"
    install_python311
    PYTHON_CMD=$(find_python311)
    if [[ -z "$PYTHON_CMD" ]]; then
        echo -e "${RED}[X] Failed to install Python 3.11${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
fi
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Python 3.11: $PYTHON_CMD${NC}"

# Check/Install Azure Functions Core Tools
if ! command -v func &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[!] Azure Functions Core Tools not found - installing...${NC}"
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then
        brew tap azure/functions
        brew install azure-functions-core-tools@4
    else
        curl https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | gpg --dearmor > microsoft.gpg
        sudo mv microsoft.gpg /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/microsoft.gpg
        sudo sh -c "echo \"deb [arch=amd64] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/microsoft-ubuntu-$(lsb_release -cs)-prod $(lsb_release -cs) main\" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/dotnetdev.list"
        sudo apt-get update
        sudo apt-get install -y azure-functions-core-tools-4
    fi
fi
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Azure Functions Core Tools installed${NC}"

# Check/Install Azure CLI
if ! command -v az &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[!] Azure CLI not found - installing...${NC}"
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then
        brew install azure-cli
    else
        curl -sL https://aka.ms/InstallAzureCLIDeb | sudo bash
    fi
fi
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Azure CLI installed${NC}"

# Check Azure CLI login
echo ""
echo -e "${YELLOW}Checking Azure CLI login...${NC}"
if ! az account show &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Running: az login${NC}"
    az login
fi
AZ_USER=$(az account show --query user.name -o tsv)
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Logged in as: $AZ_USER${NC}"
USER_OBJECT_ID=$(az ad signed-in-user show --query id -o tsv)

# Assign Storage role
echo ""
echo -e "${YELLOW}Assigning storage role...${NC}"
az role assignment create --assignee "$USER_OBJECT_ID" --role "Storage File Data Privileged Contributor" --scope "/subscriptions/$SUBSCRIPTION_ID/resourceGroups/$RESOURCE_GROUP/providers/Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/$STORAGE_ACCOUNT" 2>/dev/null || true
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Role assigned${NC}"

# Clone repository
echo ""
echo -e "${YELLOW}Cloning repository...${NC}"
if [ -d "EntraCopilotAgent365" ]; then
    cd EntraCopilotAgent365 && git pull
else
    git clone $REPO_URL && cd EntraCopilotAgent365
fi

# Create venv with Python 3.11
echo ""
echo -e "${YELLOW}Creating Python 3.11 virtual environment...${NC}"
[ -d ".venv" ] && rm -rf .venv
$PYTHON_CMD -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate
pip install --upgrade pip -q
pip install -r requirements.txt -q
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Dependencies installed${NC}"

# Create local.settings.json
echo ""
echo -e "${YELLOW}Creating local.settings.json...${NC}"
cat > local.settings.json << EOF
{
  "IsEncrypted": false,
  "Values": {
    "FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME": "python",
    "AzureWebJobsStorage__accountName": "$STORAGE_ACCOUNT",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY": "$OPENAI_KEY",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT": "$OPENAI_ENDPOINT",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION": "2024-02-01",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT_NAME": "$OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT",
    "AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME": "$STORAGE_ACCOUNT",
    "AZURE_FILES_SHARE_NAME": "$FILE_SHARE",
    "ASSISTANT_NAME": "$ASSISTANT_NAME",
    "CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTION": "$CHARACTERISTIC_DESC"
  }
}
EOF
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] local.settings.json created${NC}"

# Deploy
echo ""
echo -e "${YELLOW}Deploying to Azure...${NC}"
func azure functionapp publish $FUNCTION_APP_NAME

echo ""
echo -e "${GREEN}========================================${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}Setup Complete!${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}========================================${NC}"
echo "Function URL: $FUNCTION_URL"
echo "To run locally: ./run.sh"
')]
